title: Bike check: Team Cofidis and Victor Lafay’s stage 2-winning Look 795 Blade RS in the Tour de France
content:
Team Cofidis won stage two of the Tour de France 2023 on the new Look 795 Blade RS road bike.

Read the full article at Bike check: Team Cofidis and Victor Lafay’s stage 2-winning Look 795 Blade RS in the Tour de France on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
